document.full_text: morocco was counting the cost to its vital tourism industry on friday from an explosion at a busy marrakesh cafe that killed 15 people in an attack described by the government as a terrorist act.
document.title: morocco counts cost of bombing at tourist hotspot
lines_and_colors: morocco was counting the cost to its vital tourism industry on friday from an explosion at a busy marrakesh cafe that killed 15 people in an attack described by the government as a terrorist act.
